title: UN publishes first draft of Paris Agreement-style global treaty for tackling biodiversity loss

lead: New tracker from MSCI warns that based on current emissions world's publicly listed companies will burn through carbon budget before the end of the decade ...

title: Energy professionals call for national skills policy to enable net zero transition

title: Insurers for net zero: Major insurance firms launch Net Zero Insurance Alliance

title: 'Shocking disregard for the environment': Southern Water hit with record £90m fine over sewage spills

title: Green experts welcome government proposals for household carbon dividend

title: Enel links $4bn bond to its climate goals in 'world record' green transaction

title: 'Shocking absence of leadership': Government accused of failing to tackle fast fashion impacts
